rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, audition for red or for blue. [i](To audition for red or blue, create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token or a red or blue Role Aura on a creature you control. The red and blue roles are 3/2 Warrior with trample, a 2/2 Wizard with prowess or a 2/1 Warlock with flying.)[/i]
